prod_short_desc: Keep trouble at bay with Axl’s 3-in-1 Rumble Maker!
prod_long_desc:
Drive the Rogul out of Knighton with the 3-in-1 Rumble Maker, featuring dual rotating drill weapons, flip-out wings, detachable tank with caterpillar tracks, axe holder, 2 minifigure cockpits and 2 stud shooters. Includes 3 minifigures and 3 scannable shields.
Build Axl’s 3-in-1 drilling vehicle, tank & jet to grind down the Stone monsters threatening the kingdom!
As featured in Cartoon Network's LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ series
Includes Axl & Rogul minifigures, plus Axl Bot & Brickster figures
LEGO NEXO KNIGHTS building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
The Rumble Maker is over 3” high, 11” long and 9” wide with wings unfolded
393 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14 years old
